data.title: (I'VE HAD) THE TIME OF MY LIFE
meta_keywords: (I'VE HAD) THE TIME OF MY LIFE
(I'VE HAD) THE TIME OF MY LIFE Dirty Dancing
(I'VE HAD) THE TIME OF MY LIFE letra
data.meta_description: Dirty Dancing - (I've Had) The Time Of My Life (Letra y canción para escuchar) - Because / I've had the time of my life / No, I've never felt this way before / Yes, I swear, it's the truth / And I owe it all to you /
data.text:

And I owe it all to you
